name: EXAPUNKS: TEC Redshift Player
description: The Redshift is a fictional handheld game console in the universe of the puzzle programming game EXAPUNKS. This player will allow you to play Redshift games made by other EXAPUNKS players.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1366 x 768 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 80 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 3840â€‰x 2160 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 80 MB available space
